thread.title: Fortner, JB
thread.title_full: Vacation Rental Pros reviewed by Fortner, JB

author: Fortner, JB
title: Fortner, JB
text: This coming summer will be the second consecutive year we have rented the same house from VRP. The house was clean and exactly what we needed to have a 'whole family' vacation. We had no problems with any of the fixtures in the house and the pool was wonderful. We chose to come back to St. Augustine this year for another great time.
